definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: bald forehead (NH id., Aram. gboh.uwto0), only Le 13—abs. Le 13:42 (P; asson. [[בְּקָרַ֫חַת אוֹ בַגַּבַּ֫חַת]]); [[גַּבַּחְתּוֹ]] v:Le 13:42, v:Le 13:43 (both P & ‖[[קָרַחְתּוֹ]]); in all, as place of appearance of an eruption; v:Le 13:55 (P; ‖ id.) = in its front, i.e. front of garment.
